mapper.select:
select b.*,c.category_name from books as b , category as c where b.category_id = c.category_id
and c.category_id =#{parm.categoryId}
and b.book_name like CONCAT('%',#{parm.bookName},'%')
and b.book_place_num like CONCAT('%',#{parm.bookPlaceNum},'%')
and b.book_auther like CONCAT('%',#{parm.bookAuther},'%')
mapper.update: update books set book_store = book_store - 1 where book_id =#{bookId} and book_store > 0
update books set book_store = book_store + 1 where book_id =#{bookId}
mapper.select: select b.book_name as name,count(bb.reader_id) as value from books as b left join borrow_book bb on b.book_id = bb.book_id group by bb.book_id order by value desc limit 10
